definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
Peking ape-man/Homo erectus pekinensis (c. 600,000 BC), discovered in Zhoukoudian 周口店[Zhou1 kou3 dian4] in 1921
lit. heart like a frisky monkey, mind like a cantering horse (idiom); fig. capricious (derog.)/to have ants in one's pants/hyperactive/adventurous and uncontrollable
legendary ape of Sichuan and Yunnan, with a penchant for carrying off girls
arms like those of an ape — muscular, or long and dexterous
legendary ape of Sichuan and Yunnan, with a penchant for carrying off girls
bird in a basket, monkey in a cage (idiom); prisoner

sentences.english: May the slightest residue of white, ape calls out alone.
sentences.chinese: 梅殘半點白，猿叫一聲孤。

sentences.english: But some of the features from the upper part of the body, including the shoulder blade(17) and arms are more ape-like.
sentences.chinese: 但上半身的一些特徵，包括肩胛骨和胳膊更象猿。

sentences.english: Apes live primarily in the tropical forests of Africa and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 猿主要分佈在非洲和亞洲的熱帶森林。

sentences.english: Flexibility in adaptation is the consistent message in ape and human evolution.
sentences.chinese: 猿與人的演化史，一直以靈活的適應爲主題。
八隻猿吃了內特的線帶。

sentences.english: Species of human lice thus mirror the splits in the tree of ape and human evolution.
sentences.chinese: 人體上的蝨子物種反映了猿和人類進化歷程的分節點。

sentences.english: If the female does not shout, the male almost never climaxes.
sentences.chinese: 如果雌猿不這麼做的話，那雄猿幾乎達不到高潮。

sentences.english: Bonobos on the other hand are famously playful and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 巴諾布猿以其頑皮和友好而著稱。

sentences.english: Ape conservation tackles both of these issues head on.
sentences.chinese: 保護猿可以解決即將面臨的這兩個問題。

sentences.english: What differentiates man from the ape?
sentences.chinese: 使人興猿有所區別的是什麼？

sentences.english: Cliff such as cutting apes were left feeling useless, pedestrian road souls scattered.
sentences.chinese: 峭壁如削猿興嘆，人行棧道魂魄散。

sentences.english: Want to be reading head has white, ape cry malaria every river cane river.
sentences.chinese: 想得讀書頭已白，隔溪猿哭瘴溪藤。

sentences.english: The birds do not fly ape real, bluish white South Qin shi.
sentences.chinese: 飛鳥不飛猿不動，青驄御史上南秦。

sentences.english: He and his colleagues found the same borna virus DNA in apes and monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 他和同事在猿和猴子身上發現同樣的博納病毒DNA。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
(onom.) quack/honk/(northern dialect) very/also pr. [ga1 ga5], [ga2 ga5] etc
